website_summaries.verdict: A 20-setting graduated sunrise and sunset lamp is the standout feature in this clock radio, which makes rising on dark, dreary mornings much more pleasant.
pros: Sunrise light and alarm options work very well once programmed
Twice as many brightness settings as other models
Amber light is easy on the eyes
cons: Programming can be difficult without a thorough read of the instructions
Control buttons are tough to find in the dark

website_summaries.verdict: Use this wake-up light as an alarm, a lamp, or a way to gently fall asleep.
pros: Includes a sunrise simulation that begins 30 min
Features 20 brightness settings and 3 different alarm sounds
cons: You can't set more than one alarm
Not obvious how to set up without reading instructions

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this alarm clock in 2013, there were few alternatives. Nowadays, there are many options including some that are more affordable. Pros: very durable. It's still functional to this day. The wake up light is very bright and the transitions are smooth. The wake up sounds are relaxing. Cons: pricey. There are much cheaper options now. Setting the alarm is not intuitive. I've never had to read a manual to learn how to set an alarm or the time until I bought this one. Fortunately the manual is online so I don't have to dig for it.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this alarm clock. I will never go back to a traditional alarm clock that blares and jolts you out of sleep. This clock gradually wakes you up with the slow increase in light and I rarely get to where it reaches my present max or the audio kicks in. Love you can adjust how bright it gets, the variety of sounds, the control over the max audio. The only drawback is that it is a bit complex for some of the features and setup. The instructions are great, just keep them in a safe spot so you don't lose them. The normal functions are easy to remember.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant (literally and figuratively)
customer_reviews.text: It's brilliant. But you need to get up when the light wakes you or it doesn't seem to help as much with morning grogginess. If I get up when the light naturally wakes me I feel fantastic... but if I snooze and grumble I get up groggy and ill tempered. It's easy to use after the first few days. Easy to reset, though I wish you could set recurring alarms instead of having to reset it each day
customer_reviews.author: K. B

customer_reviews.title: Too much money for what you get
customer_reviews.text: I really love the wake up design but they need to come out with an updated one. You cannot set the alarm by the days, so you have to remeber to turn it on and off on the weekends. The buttons are poorly designed. I always hit the wrong button and have a hard time changing settings. And the time glows through the night. It is just an overall cheap looking. For the price, it is lacking a lot. If it was less I would give it 5 stars. Update: For no reason at all this clock stopped working. Had it for only a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Willhoft

customer_reviews.title: A really nice wake-up clock
customer_reviews.text: A really nice wake-up clock. The way the light comes on gradually over 30 mins is lovely and helps you prepare to get out of sleep. There're three bird-signing alarm melodies to choose from, and of the three one was really to my liking. The interface is a bit difficult to navigate through the available buttons, but that can be learnt. The great thing is that it does not require a replacement bulb -- it will just work for as long as it's meant to be. And you can bring it across continents and plug it into both 110v and 220v - lovely!
customer_reviews.author: PZ

customer_reviews.title: I set it to start getting light about 30 minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: I set it to start getting light about 30 minutes before we had to get up. I clearly noticed it getting light immediately. My husband hates it and I know I just need to reset the amount of light and when it starts to get light, but it's real pain in the butt to set. Whatever you do, do not throw away the directions! It's complicated! It has a lot of potential. I just have to use more trial and error.
customer_reviews.author: Shaila M. Ayer

customer_reviews.title: I loved it, but it only lasted from January to ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, but it only lasted from January to April when it suddenly stopped working. I've never been able to fix it. I bought this more expensive model as an investment, and I am disappointed that it didn't even make it a year.
customer_reviews.author: E S

customer_reviews.title: The buttons aren't labeled and the alarm is hard to set
customer_reviews.text: I have to check the instruction manual every time I set the alarm. When it works, it's great. When you're groggy in the morning, you don't know what button you're hitting to shut it off. Buttons are not labeled. There's a lot of guesswork involved in setting it. Still don't remember what buttons are for what function, so it's not dependable. The light and gentle sounds are nice, especially in the winter when the sun rises later and you're getting up in the dark, though. When it works, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to program
customer_reviews.text: It did not last long. I had my previous clock (a different manufacturer) for years but this didn’t make it to a first anniversary. It was always difficult to program and finally died. I do not understand how it received good reviews because for me, it was a bad experience from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works better than my alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: The light wakes me up without the need for an alarm sound. I had to play with the light brightness to get it just right for me. I have it about 6 feet from me and set to max brightness of 17. I don't use the sound portion as the light wakes me up. Way less stressful than my phone alarm. I set my phone alarm for about 30 minutes later as an emergency back up. Also, I set the display to be very very dim so the light from it does not interfere with my sleep. I wish it wasn't so large but I understand why it is.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: Had this thing for less than 6 months and it broke. Just completely stopped working one day.
customer_reviews.author: Arden

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Wake-up Light
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Wake-up Light! I purchased it for my 11 years old daughter who has to wake up at 6.00 am every day. The alarm sounds are very pleasant and natural and the light is bright, but it doesn't hurt when you open the eyes in the morning. My daughter loves dusk fading light as well, she uses it every night. It is an expensive alarm, but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: DZ

customer_reviews.title: A Skeptic Loves Her New Lamp Alarm
customer_reviews.text: My wife was complaining about waking up when it's dark during the winter, so I surprised her with this lamp. At first she was skeptical, but now she loves it...which, come to think of it, was how she felt about me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Going on 2 years of use
customer_reviews.text: This is the best money I've ever spent on something like an alarm clock. Aside from the marketed use of an alarm clock, this has been so useful as a soft, dimmable light for mood lighting, as a nightlight while nursing a baby when you don't want to wake a sleeping partner, or as a light just bright enough to see what you need to get dressed without waking a sleeping partner. This light/clock is wonderful and I think everyone should have one.
customer_reviews.author: ThisLadyLTR

customer_reviews.title: I do like this light and it has improved my wakeup
customer_reviews.text: I'll start this off saying there is room for improvement. However, I do like this light and it has improved my wakeup. I am just using the light feature, the bird chirping annoyed me after a few weeks of hearing it. I usually have to wakeup pre-dawn and I feel that this helps me wake up in a better mood and with more vigor. I'd recommend one to anyone that has trouble getting up in the dark. It does need some sort of backup, once you lose power, the clock resets. An internal rechargeable battery that could power the light for at least one cycle would great.
customer_reviews.author: Will K.

customer_reviews.title: Helps in waking up in winter
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to wake up when it's pitch black outside. This lights up the room a few minutes before the alarm is set and I like the bird songs too. I had to paint the 3 buttons (alarm on, alarm off and light off) with nail polish because I kept forgetting which is which. My advice is do that as you're reading the manual. It'll save you a lot of frustration. I got one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Kalan

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far! I was having the hardest time getting up and now I'm awake (and not in a groggy-way) before my alarm goes off!! I'm recommending this to everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Wake up happier.
customer_reviews.text: As I am in the midst of setting a better sleeping schedule in my life this has been a great help. The combination of light and the quiet bird sounds is subtle; rather than waking up in a panic/rage I now find myself easing into wakefulness. The sleep timer dimming light at night is a great feature as well -- I use this if I am reading before bed and keep it quite dim. Helps me wake up not feeling cranky.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: After 8 months the buttons stopped functioning. They work only sometimes and when it happens, you can’t turn the alarm off without entirely unplugging it. I would not have purchased this given the choice because it was really only good for 8 months and if you want an alarm clock to work longer than that then I would advise you don’t risk it either!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good morning!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life. Love waking up to the beautiful chime, but more importantly, love having the gradual light wake me. Mornings have been so much more pleasant this winter since this little gem crossed my threshold. Wish the buttons were a bit more easy to read, but the sleek design will go with any decor so I get it. If you hate waking up in the dark, this will help make it so much more pleasant when the alarm goes off.
customer_reviews.author: Gardening Girl

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly (beautifully) as advertised. :-)
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, it does help me gently wake up in the dark of winter, with its slowly growing light, and the cuckoo chirp (though I could also use the radio or other sounds if I wanted). Just the thing to easily wake up and move into meditation and then gentle “wake up” movement and stretching before that first cup of tea or coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Kalrooney

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this alarm clock! A lot of the things that other people complained about, I had no issue of. It wakes me up great and I feel so refreshed and awake when the alarm goes off, even at 4:30am. It was a hefty purchase for a college student, but if you have trouble waking up (especially in the winter when it is almost always dark) this is a FANTASTIC purchase, I think absolutely worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Deacon

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to set up
customer_reviews.text: You need an engineering degree to be able to program this!
customer_reviews.author: Carole Dowling

customer_reviews.title: Love waking up to birdies
customer_reviews.text: I love the bird noises - I also enjoy the waking up to a little "sun" but I didn't find it easy to use. I still struggle with changing the settings. I also don't like that I have to turn off the alarm and the light - separately. The buttons are tiny and there are several so I often hit the wrong ones. Maybe it's just me but I feel it could be more user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: beakedstorm266

customer_reviews.title: I bought it because I do not like waking, alarmed
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this product for five years. I bought it because I do not like waking, alarmed, in the dark to a harsh sound; then turning on a light that is harsh to my eyes. I love this "Wake-Up Light." By the time the light is fully on, I am usually gently awake. Sometimes I wait for the nature sounds, sometimes I just rise. Waking to this gradual light and gentle sound is much more peaceful than waking to an alarm clock.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: so something like this is essential
customer_reviews.text: I get up at 4:30 in the morning, so something like this is essential. My only complaint is that the "send you to sleep" mode doesn't have very precise increments. I'd like to be able to set it at 25 minutes, or over 45 minutes, but you can only do 30, 20, 15, or 10. Otherwise, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mac

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Now I have an expensive ugly lamp. Setting up the alarm function is really difficult with the touch screen and instructions. The buttons on the top are impossible to see if the light is eye level (duh) so you can easily turn on snooze/ radio etc and the chirping birds are a joke. It’s a 15 second loop that’s more annoying than an alarm. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gently wake to light and birds
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing “alarm clock” I’ve ever used. I put alarm clock in quotes because it’s so different from any other alarm I’ve ever used. It wakes me gently with the light coming on slowly brighter and brighter, and the sweet bird noises make me smile. I will never use another device to wake me again!
customer_reviews.author: BettyHues

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: apparently designed for military personnel
customer_reviews.text: Every time it gets disconnected it reverts back to military time. The instruction manual is not clear on how to get it back on 12 hour time. How many people need military time? Of those how many soldiers can sleep with this huge expensive lighted clock next to their bunk in a barracks full of other people? Phillips seems to have no common sense. This is an extremely complex machine. If you wanted a simple clock radio that wakes you with light simulating sunlight, don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Kelly

customer_reviews.title: It does help
customer_reviews.text: This product does help me wake up in the morning. The one thing about the product that I would change is that the buttons on the top of the round clock are very difficult to see. The Display does have a setting that lets you turn down the brightness of the clock function at night (mild orange light, no blue light, very nice) but the function buttons are difficult to tell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Thornton-Wiatt

customer_reviews.title: I wake soooo much better now! I had one version or another of ...
customer_reviews.text: I wake soooo much better now! I had one version or another of this light in my cart ever since I saw one in the Sky Mall catalogue. I finally pulled the trigger and bought it and I'm glad I did. Yes, the buttons on top do take some getting used to, but it is totally doable. The clock and wake up lights are adjustable as is the sound level. All this makes for a much more relaxed wake up process. I initially set a back up alarm, but it was never an issue. Yay! Very happy with my purchase. Wish I would have bought it ages ago.
customer_reviews.author: JC Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS CLOCK!! My master bedroom is in the basement. It’s dark, quiet and safe during tornado season. However, with no light, waking up was hard. This comes on very softly and gradually until the room is bathed in light.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Munn

customer_reviews.title: I love this clock
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock, one thing that it changed is that I would snooze my regular alarm clock over and over again. When I wake up to this clock I am awake, the gradual light transitions me from sleep to being awake. I might snooze the birds (love the birds but I do wish the loop of sound was a little longer so it didn't repeat so quickly) but the light stays on. Once the birds go, one snooze and I am out of bed ready to kick that day in the pants!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this purchase and have already recommended the clock to coworkers. I have owned a similar Lumie lamp when I lived in the UK and thought I would try this one out now that Autumn is approaching. The light waking my body naturally is awesome and it really works. The reason for the four stars is that the instructions were not super clear on how to set-up and it has taken a few days to try and get the light and sound just about right. Also, the cost for the clock I feel is a bit high, but hoping that the product will last for 10+ years.
customer_reviews.author: digiproducer

customer_reviews.title: Will not do miracles!
customer_reviews.text: This product will not do miracles! I have been using this product for 2 months. Having the light on when you wake up can be helpful, but it will not force you to wake up. I personally hate the bird sounds. It actually soothes me back to sleep. I don't like the traditional alarm sound, but it's the only thing that will annoy me enough to get up. I have developed the bad habit of covering my face with the blanket when the light comes on so the light is not doing the job. Nothing will replace good sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Jisseidy Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Yes, the controls are extremely annoying and cumbersome...
customer_reviews.text: ...But it's completely worth it to have something that wakes me and only me up at 5:30! I had a similar clock many years ago that didn't have all the options of this one and I loved it until it was killed by a lightening bolt. I love that the volume and brightness can be adjusted to individual preference. I wake up much happier with this than the typical obnoxious beep or a strange voice suddenly in my room. I tried a few others in between: some had an annoying blue quality to the light, others weren't bright or loud enough. One blinked brightly and had the old time bell alarm that scared the *bleep* outta me....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's OK...
customer_reviews.text: Has 2 colors - white & green!. Cannot read time when light comes on. Cannot distinguish much subtlety in the brightness of the light from beginning to alarm. It's just - ok!
customer_reviews.author: Jane W.

customer_reviews.title: Over priced and annoying way to start the day!!
customer_reviews.text: I found this item to be cheaply made for the price. The buttons are confusing and it's very difficult to determine how to turn it off in the morning. You can't read the buttons and they are all white. I actually just use this for a clock now as I found it to be a very annoying way to wake up. I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Edgcomb

customer_reviews.title: Waking up to sunlight and birds chirping
customer_reviews.text: Overall: Good little "sunlight" alarm Pros BRIGHT light that slowly increases as you approach alarm time. Birds chirp if you want it to as wake up time approaches. Setting time and alarm is relatively easy. Great as a night light. There is control redundancy on the edges for haptic navigation and touch for "fancy" front-face setting. Cons You may need to read the manual to set the time and alarm The packaging was a little superfluous with tons of plastic on everything, so not very green for a wellness product...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The light part works fine but this will not be a year round device
customer_reviews.text: There are two sets of controls -the front touch screen and the ringed buttons. Absolutely way to sensitive - every time I move it I have to reset it. With my glasses off I'm not able to read the smallish sized display at night. The light part works fine but this will not be a year round device. Once spring comes I'm pulling out my regular alarm clock. I a surprised. The design work of Phillips is typically much better than this.
customer_reviews.author: John in Seatte

customer_reviews.title: Never going back
customer_reviews.text: So glad I made the splurge on this alarm clock. I used to be the hit snooze 3 times person. I have had it for a few months now and can't imagine going back. Wish I had it at the beginning of winter. I wake up with ease and pleasantly. Best thing ever.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Other reviewers are right
customer_reviews.text: The gradually increasing light is awesome. Almost daylight-bright at its brightest. I bought it for myself, but it also wakes up my husband...which can be good or bad. There are two sound options ("natural" and the radio) and you must choose one, or all you get is the light when the alarm trips. The "natural" sound is annoying as others said. The radio has excellent reception. I've used this unit for about two months and every time I use it I press random buttons to turn the thing off. Suppose I should read the instructions, but I guess I assume that it should be simpler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It actually helps!
customer_reviews.text: This is a much better alternative to a wah-wah-wah buzzer in your ear or blasting a radio station to wake up to. The feature I like best is that it starts to lightly glow 30 minutes before your wake-up time and then lights up progressively brighter as your set wake up time nears. Once your alarm time arrives you are greeted by the soothing wake up melody/sounds that you chose. My only gripe is the small (TINY) buttons on the top used to turn off the alarm. Several months in and I still fumble to turn this thing off. Give it a bigger "off" button and it gets 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: JGM

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Love this product. Helps me pull myself out of bed with the gradual light on the alarm for those dreary winter mornings
customer_reviews.author: Sydney VanRooyen

customer_reviews.title: Best Alarm Clock ever!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing clock I have ever had!! I usually wake up as if I have been shaken, and this clock wakes up your brain little by little and by the time the alarm finally sounds, you are happy and jolly! I bought it with this in mind, but it works much better than I ever expected! I have also bought one for my daughter and it actually taught her to wake up in time for school! (And in a good mood as well...) This is a must have!!
customer_reviews.author: ClaraA

customer_reviews.title: It does not work
customer_reviews.text: As the light starts to brighten in the morning, it starts blinking then goes off over and over. I might have just gotten a bum one
customer_reviews.author: Penny Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Thin cord is easily damaged
customer_reviews.text: I want to use this so badly but I have now returned a second lamp with a damaged cord. The cord is so thin and wound so tight on packaging that it compromises the exterior coating. The first cord was crimped with exposed wire and wouldn't work. The second cord completely severed in two. Maybe the third time is the charm?
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Need an additional alarm, the volume is too soft
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great, but there are a few things I wish were better: 1. The volume for bird sounds only goes to 3 which is very quiet and I always sleep through it (I’m a light sleeper) 2. The booklet says there are 2 alarm settings but mine only has one.
customer_reviews.author: NY

customer_reviews.title: This is the answer to my dilemma of not being able to wake up when its dark out
customer_reviews.text: I love this light, wakes me up nice and easy so my mind thinks it woke itself up. Much less mental stress in the morning waking up this way. Plus it also has a reverse feature which is nice for powering down at the end of the day. I have the alarm set to birds chirping which is really nice and my cats have not given up on trying to find out where the birds are coming from. No reason to spend more and cheaper ones don't have as many features. This one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shari D.

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t notice how large this thing is. Works nicely and good sounds but I don’t have much space for it so it’s going back.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifm

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love waking up to this alarm clock, especially in the winter when it is completely dark every morning when I have to get up. The gradual increase of light and sound is so much more pleasant than a blaring alarm clock. I also really love the "sunset" function that allows you to set a timer to gradually decrease the light. You can easily read by this light at the brighter settings and set the mood with the lower settings. I only wish that there were multiple alarms that could be set instead of just one. Definitely worth the money if you are not a morning person or have odd working hours.
customer_reviews.author: KelseyO89

customer_reviews.title: Great sounds available too
customer_reviews.text: really does the trick of giving us a gentle wake up and the illusion of natural light. I turn it on in the afternoon when the sun sets (3 p.m.) and dim it on occasion to create a sunset as well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Charles

customer_reviews.title: It is ok, not for the price though
customer_reviews.text: I think it is quite overpriced. Had purchased a cheaper one to compare, not this brand, and I think I like the options on the cheaper one better. Will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why people are so confused by the instructions on this. I've just bought my second one for another bedroom. On days when I don't wake up with this alarm, I feel more startled awake and less good about starting the day. I'm a big fan.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works well for waking the family up vs.mjust using an alarm or trying to wake them up myself. Kids like the birds and talk about them. I don't' use the radio feature or the other sounds. The light is brightest when facing the pig. It works well in that the moment it turns on and starts to brighten, I wake up immediately.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Best Alarm Clock Ever! Until it broke....
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this alarm clock during the winter dark months! The brightness, natural sounds and ease of use. I bought the alarm clock in November of 2018 - in under a year, one of the internal buttons is jammed on, making the alarm clock un-useable. I am bummed how quickly it broke - for the money I would expect a couple years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa

customer_reviews.title: Okay alarm clock lacking features, good bedside lamp.
customer_reviews.text: This alarm clock is pretty good. It wakes you up with light and sound, and it works really well as a bedside lamp. However, it's lacking some features that other alarm clocks I've owned have had. There's no backup battery on this alarm clock, meaning if it loses power you're screwed. You can also only set one alarm. There's also no presets on alarms, so I can't set one preset for 10:00, and another for 8:00 (one for weekdays, one for weekends). Overall, I wish it had more features than present. Also, the wakeup to birds / light has been slightly gentler than waking up to a normal alarm, but the light doesn't really wake me up.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Okay.
customer_reviews.text: I don't really get the hype about this--it doesn't really light up the room like you might expect for a light alarm. Features are very cool and thoughtful, but I wouldn't spend the money on this. Find other option for waking challenges.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Schuman

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a bedroom that gets next to zero sunlight. My window faces a brick wall. Chicago problems. I have lived in this apartment for two months and I have not gotten up on time or felt rested at all since. The wake-up light has turned all of that around. I sleep well, I wake up refreshed, and it provides very bright light the same color as sunlight. I don't necessarily feel like the sun is shining brightly into my room but it still a very pleasant, energizing glow. Also, the onboard sounds are great and the quality of the sounds through the speakers is surprisingly nice. I haven't a single complaint about this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Porcaro

customer_reviews.title: I bought this version for a friend and I own ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this version for a friend and I own the next model up, which was a little more expensive. This model has 3 sound settings and the snooze is a button on top. The model that I own has a colored sunrise simulation (which includes amber), a tap-the-face-of-the-clock style snooze, and several sound options. I can't pick up a radio station on either version, but I live out in the middle of nowhere.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chestnut

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My spouse loves this. Brightness and volume fully adjustable. It is a bit on the large size, takes up significant space on the bedside table, and the controls are not intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: Best alarm-clock ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best alarm-clock ever. The bird sounds do get annoying as it is a loop that is quite short (maybe 30 seconds at most) but it eases you awake with the light first. The setting sun function is great to read before bed, lets you know when its time to stop because you can't see the page anymore
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Dax Stephenson Losey

customer_reviews.title: The light gets really bright which is great. I'm sure it will be much more helpful ...
customer_reviews.text: This light definitely helps me wake up less disturbed, but my partner still doesn't wake up well with it. I wish there were a few more sounds that were as light as the nature ones. I had to pick one that is musical because the FM radio woke me up thinking someone was in my room shouting at me. The light gets really bright which is great. I'm sure it will be much more helpful in winter when it's still dark out at 630.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The light change is great - it's a gradual increase in light over a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. The light change is great - it's a gradual increase in light over a 30 minute period so by the time your alarm goes off it's very bright and your body has had time to react to the light increase. It can be very bright, or you can have a dim lighting. Quite nice to be able to adjust the mood/light of my room.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna M. Loh

customer_reviews.title: Best alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: I always felt my traditional alarm clock would wake me up so abruptly and I wouldn’t start off the day on the right foot. With this clock I wake up much more naturally! I also love the feature to have the light dim at night to transition to sleep as well. Love this alarm clock!
customer_reviews.author: cjr2017

customer_reviews.title: instructions impossible to follow
customer_reviews.text: WORST. MANUAL. EVER. I can usually follow instruction. Not these. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: rw

customer_reviews.title: Wake up naturally and feel refreshed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wake-up light because a co-worker has one and raved about how well it worked for him. I normally wouldn't pay this much for an alarm clock, but was given a gift card for amazon and thought, why not? I'm super glad I bought this product. I wake up naturally and feel refreshed. I'm on my third week of waking up with it. I cannot imagine waking up without it. I wake up before the alarm sounds. It's well worth the money spent! I'll never go back to waking up with my cell phone alarm again!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta A Boyd

customer_reviews.title: There are many buttons that are not easily distinguishable from one another which makes it frustrating to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light almost a year ago and I still use it daily. It is especially helpful at waking me up in the winter months when it is still dark outside at my normal wake up time. The reason I deducted a star is due to the complexity of the buttons. Even after a year, I fumble in the morning to turn the alarm and the light off. There are many buttons that are not easily distinguishable from one another which makes it frustrating to navigate. However, it does have many great features that are operated by these frustrating buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Beth C.

customer_reviews.title: Like waking up on a sunny day.
customer_reviews.text: I love this alarm clock. I have wanted one for years and due to the fantastic pricing of Amazon Deal of the day I finally broke down and purchased it. I wish I would have done it earlier. In the Puget sound it gets light late and most of the time we are cloud covered in the morning making S.A.D. a real problem. Getting out of bed is hard at 3:30 is hard, but since buying this clock every day is sunny and I wake up refreshed and ready for the day ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never going back!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant when first considering this alarm clock, but I really enjoy it. Yes, some of the buttons could be placed a little more conveniently; however, I will give-up a little functionality for the interesting design. Also, if the light doesn't wake you up, the alarm sounds are so peaceful and realistic that they are just as enjoyable to wake-up to. Really glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Weston

customer_reviews.title: this is slick. actually works well and is surprisingly ...
customer_reviews.text: this is slick. actually works well and is surprisingly bright. the buttons and interface could use some improvement but as an alarm clock it works really well. wish they had it in black.
customer_reviews.author: James Francalangia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Life changer for SAD husband. He wakes up happy now. It's annoying, actually.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: Product is over priced for what it is. I really like the light function as I wake up to that before the sound goes off but it is not user friendly- takes a while to get used to it. I do not care for the sounds so have it to radio which does not come in great.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Best way to wakeup!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. We wake up more alert and use the bird chirp sounds, which makes for a more pleasant wakeup feeling. Minor wish would be that sound starts maybe 15 minutes into 1/2 hour of light brightening sequence instead of at the end, at the 1/2 hour mark. Other than that, I highly recommend this. So much easier to get out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: Looch

customer_reviews.title: Works periodically
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredibly great concept, but it doesn't work half the time. An alarm clock needs to be pretty reliable and this is not. Since purchasing a few months ago we have had to unplug and reset the alarm clock about once every week. As of today we cannot set the alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Schall

customer_reviews.title: Well made, easy to operate, works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This light/alarm is pretty easy to set up and operate, but experiment with light settings to get it the way you want it. I don't use the sound features (just set volume control to "off"), so no comment on that. I would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Moorhead 22

customer_reviews.title: Great for People with Hearing Impairment.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mom as she is hard of hearing and has resorted to putting her bedside lamp on a time. Her words were "I really like this - it indeed worked this morning and it has such a soft glow in the evening. It's really nice, thank you much!". If my Mom is happy, I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $100
customer_reviews.text: Cool product but it wasn’t worth it for me. Returned the clock
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for Me!
customer_reviews.text: This light/alarm does exactly what it states. A gradual light starts 30 minutes before the scheduled alarm and wakes you up with a simulated sunrise and a nice cheerful alarm. I do agree with the other reviews that the buttons are very small and difficult to distinguish from one another but maybe that's by design. All in all this has made morning a little less hard on me.
customer_reviews.author: CodiN.

customer_reviews.title: I have owned this one for a couple of years ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this one for a couple of years. It is hard to program and finding the right button to push in the morning is a pain. The wake up light works well and makes for a more natural waking process. However, I would look elsewhere for something that is more user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soothing wake up works every time.
customer_reviews.text: I live in alaska and this light is the gentlest wakeup in the dark winter months...almost too gentle. The light gets very bright but my mind doesn't rouse until the sounds of birds (one of 3 natural sounds) starts to sing. At the first twitter my brain comes out of dreamland. Sometimes I lay in bed a long time just listening to the bird sounds, which isn't great when I need to get up. But the light is definitely helpful for making me feel like sleepy time is over. It's best to have it right next to your face.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Wakes you up gently, then infuriates you when you try to find the button to turn it off.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, this alarm clock rouses you from sleep very gently. It doesn't jolt you awake. My main issue with it are the finnicky and unintuitive controls. Most of the control buttons are on the outside edge of the clock, and are not clearly marked. They also feel and look identical to each other, so it's hard to tell which button is for dimming the light, and which one is for setting the alarm.
customer_reviews.author: MR TY FUNG

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend the Wake-Up Light by Philips
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend the Wake-Up Light by Philips. I purchased the light for my 10 year old daughter who is VERY difficult to wake up-especially during the school year. The features on the clock/light are great. The buttons are a bit hard to see, but once you learn the clock, it is not a problem at all. The "sun down" feature is terrific-helps my daughter know just how long she has to read before it's lights out and time to go to sleep. The best part of all is that my daughter now wakes up much, much easier, and in a much better mood!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Komis

customer_reviews.title: Works great for what I need it for
customer_reviews.text: Works great for what I need it for. But there are a couple issues that I have with it since this is replaced a HF3470. - the buttons on front are flat on the face of the light, this makes it really hard to find them when the lighting is not in your favor. - the buttons on top are hard to find in the dark, you end up trying to push multiple ones just to find the dimmer button. Other than that this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Great concept works well.  Controls are tiny.
customer_reviews.text: This alarm clock really helps me wake up in the morning with its gradually increasing brightness. My only complaint is that the controls (radio, clock, light, alarm) are *tiny* and very hard to find around the top and sides of the circular light housing. It's hard to tell them apart, and after a month of using this, I'm still turning on the radio when I meant to turn on the light, and vice-versa.
customer_reviews.author: Dom Bucciarelli

customer_reviews.title: Dawn simulator is a phenomenal way to wake up in the morning
customer_reviews.text: The actual idea is great - execution, not so much! Flimsy construction (the casing on mine broke after only a short time). Save your money and buy a cheaper version!
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: it's all good. Perfect addition for my health and wellness efforts ...
customer_reviews.text: Luckily I'm "button" savvy. The operation for this light can be confusing, but once you get the hang of it, it's all good. Perfect addition for my health and wellness efforts in the winter or all year round. Love this. Should have purchased one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen A. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Best decision
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best alarm clock I’ve ever had. My husband and I don’t even need sound anymore to wake us. The gradual light and light intensity is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Louise

customer_reviews.title: buggy
customer_reviews.text: buggy. I've had 3. They are great as long as they are working. Philips is good about replacing them if it's within the first year. But that doesn't help if you miss school because your alarm doesn't go off so get ready for that.
customer_reviews.author: will33

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This wake-up light is really wonderful. I don't super-love the orange color, but the birdsong alarm and gradually growing light is exactly what I need to wake up peacefully in the morning. No more jarring alarms for me! The radio isn't fantastic, but it'll do in a pinch. I recommend this to everyone who has to get up before dawn.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clock in January of 2015. The features are nice but the buttons no longer work. I expected way more than two years of use out of this expensive clock. I've got a $5 clock that's twenty years old that still works.
customer_reviews.author: hlapla1

customer_reviews.title: Best part of waking up
customer_reviews.text: Waking up is still not my favorite thing, but the gradual increase in light makes the process much easier. The wake up light begins lighting up 30 minutes before the alarm goes off. I usually notice the light about ten minutes before the alarm goes off, giving me time to gradually wake up before hearing the alarm. I have found, waking up in this way gives me more energy in the morning and leaves me in a better mood each morning.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Schenk

customer_reviews.title: Easily something that has changed my life and how I ...
customer_reviews.text: Easily something that has changed my life and how I wake up in the morning. If you have to wake up before dawn and struggle with it, get this or a lamp like it. It will make it not easy, but definitely more manageable.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Oh what a beautiful morning!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few years now, and it's great through the winter, or when I need to wake up before dawn. I don't view it as natural sunlight, but it is so much easier to wake up when the room is light.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Felicis

customer_reviews.title: Worked way better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that this would make getting up any easier. But this morning it worked great. I usually can't drag myself out of bed any earlier than 6:30 am no matter how many alarms I set. I set this alarm for 5:30 am and I was able to drag myself out by 5:45 am.
customer_reviews.author: Deja

customer_reviews.title: Best alarm
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Wakes me up to birds chirping, and light gradually comes on like a sunrise
customer_reviews.author: JohnBoy

customer_reviews.title: Great way to wake up!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for people who want a more natural way to wake up than a loud alarm.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: This really wakes you up in a much better way than a screeching alarm
customer_reviews.text: This really wakes you up in a much better way than a screeching alarm. Perfect for winter when it's so dark. It gets 4 stars cause it's hard to find the buttons in the dark for it as they're on the sides and small and all white. I balked at spending this type of dough on an alarm but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Curmudgeon

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Although some reviewers were unhappy with the features, I think this light is great! I use it just about every morning. It gets very bright, but that can be adjusted back to fit anyone's preferences. When the clock is on the brightest setting it is a little annoying, but it has four levels and the brightness has never bothered me when it's on the lower two settings. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Best for your room, for your mood and easier wake-up
customer_reviews.text: My previous old model of philips wake up light broke and that's why I have ordered a new one: it became a kind of essential for some reasons: It allows you to wake up easily especially in winter mornings when it's dark as it is night, It is used as a lamp while reading in the evening It is used as a night-light due to built-in dimmer ( 20 settings of brightness I mean) And it fits my bed-room design ! I am fully satisfied with the new device! But I would recommend to add a specific information on voltage/ adapter/ type of plug to product description on web site for those who makes orders outside US
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

product_meta.title: Philips Wake-Up Light Alarm Clock with Sunrise Simulation and Sunset Fading Night Light, White (HF3510)
product_meta.description:
Clinical research has shown that the Wake-Up Light leaves users with an improved mood and energy level throughout the day.View larger The Wake-Up Light provides a pleasant start for your day.View larger SUNRISE SIMULATION FOR NATURAL WAKING
The simulated sunrise of the Philips Wake-Up Light provides a more natural waking experience and improved morning energy levels. Featuring a soft UV-free light with up to 300-lux illuminance, the light offers a pleasant glow without harsh tones. The warm yellow light begins 30 minutes prior to your alarm time, increasing in intensity as your chosen waking time approaches. The Wake-Up Light offers the option of waking up to your favorite FM radio station or to one of three pre-programmed nature sounds. Offering 20 brightness settings, this light also comes with convenient features such as non-slip feet and a dimming light for relaxing before bedtime.

BEDSIDE LAMP WITH DIMMING LIGHT AT NIGHT
At night, the Wake-Up Light provides a gradually dimming light that helps guide you to natural, restful sleep. With 20 brightness settings, the Wake-Up Light is also a convenient bedside lamp for reading or relaxing at night. The durable Wake-Up Light is designed with rubber, anti-slip feet, so it will sit securely on your nightstand. The projected display is paired with easy-to-use touch keys on top of the lamp.

NATURE SOUNDS OR FM RADIO WITH SNOOZE BUTTON
In addition to FM radio stations, the Wake-Up Light can also wake you with one of three pre-programmed nature sounds, such as Birds in the Forest and Zen Garden. The Wake-Up Light also offers a snooze function, giving you an extra 9 minutes of sleep.

A WAKE-UP LIGHT CLINICALLY PROVEN TO WORK
The Philips wake-up light is scientifically proven to work. In order to make the Wake-up Light the best possible product it can be in genuinely waking you up naturally and energized, Philips has done a lot of clinical research. This research was conducted by independent science facilities to study and prove the effects of the wake-up light on the overall wake up experience. The Philips Wake-up Light not only wakes you more naturally, but also more energized and that it improves your mood in the morning. Philips was founded over 100 years ago as a company that produced and sold light bulbs. Over 100 years Philips grew into a global company that brings innovation in lots of different areas. To this day lighting still is the soul of Philips. The Wake-up Light is proud to continue its heritage by building on years of knowledge and expertise of the world's most well known lighting expert.

PHILIPS WAKE-UP LIGHT, HF3510/60 FEATURES:
 * Sunrise simulation and three sound selections wake you up naturally
 * Light comes on 30 minutes before alarm time
 * Dimming display with 20 brightness settings
 * Control alarm times and snooze with easy-to-use touch keys
 * Independent research shows that 92 percent of Philips users find it is easier to get out of bed
